extendedInfo.description: Are you a great fan of football game?? Football - the most popular game in the world.Some may call it soccer.Football stars HD wallpaper give you the best, high definition wallpapers of football of all famous soccer stars. Legendary Football wallpapers of the game soccer around the globe who had won our hearts is now on your phone. The best curated , brilliantly edited high definition wallpapers with classy ,sleek design and brilliant transition which will gives your android home screen an elegant touch. Moreover Football Stars Wallpaper app gives you very smooth real-time rendering and every slide will replace the pictures of Cristiano Ronaldo , Neymer , David Beckham , Fernando Torres , Wayne Rooney , Zinedine Zidane , Lionel Messi , David villa, Ronaldinho and so on . Unforgettable moments of English premier league (EPL), Champions league , Spanish League , German Bundes League has raised the spirit of football players as well as fans . Fantasy football league is something that is trending. College football teams try to improve their skills on football game through this fantasy football leagues . They want to be like Ronaldinho, David Beckham , Robin van Persie , Neymer , Mesut Ozil , Fernando Torres and football managers of different schools and colleges train their student's the game of football . As 2013 Confederationâs cup final is about to happen and 2014 World cup is on the doors major people from major soccer countries like Brazil , Argentina , Spain , Germany has been at the peak of excitement and expectation and eagerly waiting to see their team to win . And football teams like England , France , Netherlands , Italy is training hard for raising challenge for the upcoming World cup football 2014 happening in Brazil. At this point of time World famous football players, the masters of the game of football like Lionel Messi , Wayne Rooney , Xavi , Cristiano Ronaldo , Arjen Robben represented famous football clubs like Barcelona ready for the live action. Now people love to see all the free , live and 3D wallpapers of soccer game stars like Fernando Torres Didier Drogba , Steven Gerrard . Famous players like Iker Casillas , Luis Suarez , Frank Lampard ,Wesley Sneijder , Michel Ballack , Mario Ballotelli can make a football team so strong and now you can have all these stars on your android mobile home screen. Football wallpapers are often bought for a huge price for decorating a fan's wall . So here we comes with this whole new free football action .Though Messi wallpapers cannot give the live football action experience it can make a fan thrilled if he belongs to the real soccer fan league . Christiano Ronaldo wallpapers also have the same effect . Players like Fernando Torres , Xabi Alonso , Iniesta are good models . Some football clubs logos are also beautiful . Anyway the football wallpaper live free collection is always of great demand . Even soccer quiz is a widely sought after application .This app has been successfully tested on mobile phone devices like Samsung galaxy , Sony xperia , HTC series,and LG Optimus. Soon it will be launched in iPhone and Blackberry devices. Features: * Selected Free HD Football Wallpapers are definitely the high level collection. * Custom designed for matching the home screen of different android screens. * FREE application. * Small size. * Easy to use. If you are crazy about football game and you love this sport some cool, amazing and beautiful football wallpapers are waiting here for you.!!!!! So Install and have Fun!!
